$$enter({
    "character": "Five",
    "space": "left"
});
>>Five;
Welcome, Twelve.#
This is just a sample thing right now, but hopefully it'll be a little more than that once we're done.#
>>Twelve;
Ok.#
>>Five;
I want to use this format because <wow>it allows us to do really cool things like this!</wow>#
>>Twelve;
Okay, this is epic.#
>>Continue script here...;
#
